.. _upgrading:

Upgrade Guide
=============

This page contains specific upgrading instructions to help you migrate between
Express-Stormpath releases.


Version 0.2.2 -> Version 0.2.3
------------------------------

**No changes needed!**


Version 0.2.1 -> Version 0.2.2
------------------------------

**No changes needed!**


Version 0.2.0 -> Version 0.2.1
------------------------------

**No changes needed!**
